translated: Subhūti, it is because sentient beings, immeasurability, space, and the Great Vehicle—all of these—cannot be apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, the dharma-constituent should be known as nonexistent because sentient beings do not exist.

original: chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The sky should be known as nonexistent because the dharma-constituent does not exist.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle should be known as nonexistent because the sky does not exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The immeasurable should be known as nonexistent because the Great Vehicle does not exist.

original: dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir grangs med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir grangs med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The countless should be known as nonexistent because the immeasurable does not exist.

original: grangs med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: grangs med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: The infinite should be known as nonexistent because the countless does not exist.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: Subhūti, the Great Vehicle thus makes room for sentient beings who are immeasurable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: innumerable, and infinite.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar sems can rnams gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / dpag tu med pa gang yin pa dang / grangs med pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar sems can rnams gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / dpag tu med pa gang yin pa dang / grangs med pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because sentient beings, the dharma-constituent, space, the Mahāyāna, the unlimited, the countless,

original: tshad med pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and the immeasurable are all non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid med par rig par bya'o //🔽de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' @303a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid med par rig par bya'o // de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' @303a *//
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, suchness should be known to be non-existent because sentient beings do not exist.

original: med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Space should be known to be non-existent because suchness does not exist.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The Mahāyāna should be known to be non-existent because space does not exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The unlimited should be known to be non-existent because the Mahāyāna does not exist.

original: dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir grangs med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir grangs med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The countless should be known to be non-existent because the unlimited do not exist.

original: grangs med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: grangs med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there are no incalculable numbers, you should know that there are no immeasurables.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Since there are no immeasurables, you should know that all phenomena do not exist.🔽Subhūti, therefore, that Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance, and it outshines the world with its brilliance because it is the Great Vehicle.

original: rab 'byor / de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /🔽grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med / grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar sems can rnams gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang; theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / dpag tu med pa gang yin pa dang / grangs med pa gang yin pa dang /🔽tshad med pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar sems can rnams gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang; theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / dpag tu med pa gang yin pa dang / grangs med pa gang yin pa dang /🔽tshad med pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle outshines the world with its brilliance.🔽Subh

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self, there is no sentient being.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang; skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang; skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a sentient being, you should know that there is no life-force, no living being, no person, no human, no man, no one born of Manu, no descendant of Manu, no agent, no experiencer, no knower, and no seer.

original: shes pa po dang / @303b mthong ba po med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / @303b mthong ba po med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a knower and a seer, you should know that there is no limit of reality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the limit of reality, you should know that there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of space, you should know that there is no Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the Great Vehicle, you should know that there is no immeasurability, no innumerability, and no boundlessness.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Since the immeasurables do not exist, all phenomena should be known to be nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: Subhūti, in this way, the Great Vehicle provides space for innumerable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: immeasurable, and limitless sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; rab 'byor /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; rab 'byor /
translated: Why is that? Subhūti,

original: 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / dpag tu med pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / dpag tu med pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: it is because the self, the knower, the seer, the limit of reality, space, the Great Vehicle, the innumerable,

original: grangs med pa gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grangs med pa gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the immeasurable, the limitless, and all phenomena are all unobservable.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self, there is no sentient being, and so on up to there is no knower and no seer.

original: shes ba po dang; mthong ba po med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes ba po dang; mthong ba po med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a knower and a seer,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: you should know that the inconceivable element does not exist.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o /
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the inconceivable element, you should know that space does not exist.

original: @304a *// nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: @304a *// nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of space, you should know that the Great Vehicle does not exist.🔽Because of the nonexistence of the Great Vehicle, you should know that the immeasurable,

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: the countless, and the infinite do not exist.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the infinite, you should know that all phenomena do not exist.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of such bodhisattva great beings as that is immeasurable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: and the immeasurable and innumerable [beings] are made room for.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self and all dharmas up to the end are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, you should know that because of the non-existence of a self, there are no sentient beings, up to no knowers and no seers.

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir gzugs med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir gzugs med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the non-existence of knowers and seers, there is no form.

original: gzugs med pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the non-existence of form, there is no feeling, no perception, no volitional factors, and no consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the non-existence of consciousness, there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the non-existence of space, there is no Mahāyāna.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Great Vehicle, you should know that there are no infinite, countless, and limitless beings.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there are no limitless beings,

original: chos thams cad med @304b par rig par bya ste /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: chos thams cad med @304b par rig par bya ste / rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: you should know that there are no phenomena.

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in this way the Great Vehicle makes room for infinite, countless, limitless beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self and all phenomena are unobservable.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang; shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang; shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because there is no self, there are no sentient beings, and so on, up to no knowers and no seers.

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir mig med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir mig med par rig par bya'o //
translated: And because there are no knowers and no seers, you should know that there are no eyes.

original: mig med pa'i phyir rna ba dang / sna dang; lce dang / lus dang / yid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mig med pa'i phyir rna ba dang / sna dang; lce dang / lus dang / yid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the eye, one should know that the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind do not exist.

original: yid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the thinking mind, one should know that space does not exist.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of space, one should know that the Great Vehicle does not exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the Great Vehicle, one should know that the immeasurable, the countable, and the infinite do not exist.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the infinite, one should know that all dharmas do not exist.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: Subhūti, thus that Great Vehicle outshines the immeasurable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: countable, and infinite beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self and all dharmas up to the end are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / @305a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / @305a *//
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because there is no self, there are no sentient beings,

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and so on up to there being no one who knows and no one who sees.

original: shes ba po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes ba po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because there is no one who knows and no one who sees, there is no perfection of generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Because there is no perfection of generosity, you should know that there is no perfection of moral discipline, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no perfection of wisdom, you should know that there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no space, you should know that there is no Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Great Vehicle, you should know that there are no infinite, countless, and limitless beings.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: you should know that there are no infinite, countless, and limitless beings.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste / rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: Because there are no infinite, countless, and limitless beings, you should know that all phenomena do not exist.

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in this way, that Great Vehicle makes room for infinite, countless, limitless beings.

original: da ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: da ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self and all phenomena are unobservable.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because there is no self, there are no sentient beings, and so on, up to no knowers and no seers.

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med @305b pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med @305b pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because there is no knower and no seer, you should know that internal emptiness does not exist.

original: nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because internal emptiness does not exist, you should know that up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature does not exist.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature does not exist, you should know that space does not exist.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because space does not exist, you should know that the Great Vehicle does not exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the Great Vehicle does not exist, you should know that the immeasurable, the countless, and the unlimited do not exist.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Because the unlimited do not exist, you should know that all phenomena do not exist.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: Subhūti, thus that Great Vehicle makes room for immeasurable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: countless, and unlimited sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?🔽

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you ask why, Su­bhūti, it is because the self and all things are unobservable.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, you should know that because the self does not exist, sentient beings do not exist, and so on, up to knowers and viewers do not exist.

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because knowers and viewers do not exist, you should know that the applications of mindfulness do not exist.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽yang dag par spong pa med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba med par rig par bya'o // yang dag par spong pa med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the applications of mindfulness do not exist, you should know that the correct exertions do not exist.🔽Because the correct exertions do not exist, you should know that the supports for miraculous ability do not exist.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'i phyir dbang po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'i phyir dbang po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the supports for miraculous ability do not exist, you should know that the faculties do not exist.

original: dbang @306a *// po med pa'i phyir stobs med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang @306a *// po med pa'i phyir stobs med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the faculties do not exist, you should know that the powers do not exist.

original: stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of power, the limbs of enlightenment should be understood as nonexistent.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'i phyir lam med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'i phyir lam med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the limbs of enlightenment, the path should be understood as nonexistent.

original: lam med pa'i phyir stobs bcu med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lam med pa'i phyir stobs bcu med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the path, the ten powers should be understood as nonexistent.

original: stobs bcu med pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu med pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses should be understood as nonexistent.

original: mi 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the four fearlessnesses, the four kinds of exact knowledge should be understood as nonexistent.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the four kinds of exact knowledge, the eighteen special qualities of a Buddha should be understood as nonexistent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the absence of the eighteen special qualities of a Buddha,

original: nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: space should be understood as nonexistent.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of space, the Great Vehicle should be understood as nonexistent.🔽Because of the absence of the Great Vehicle, the immeasurable,

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: the incalculable, and the infinite should be understood as nonexistent.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste / rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: Since the immeasurables do not exist, all phenomena should be known to be nonexistent.

original: grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in this way the Great Vehicle makes room for infinite, innumerable, and limitless sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self and all phenomena are unobservable.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / @306b mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / @306b mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, you should know that sentient beings do not exist because the self does not exist, and so on, up to knowers and seers do not exist.

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the phenomena of the stages of the family do not exist because knowers and seers do not exist.

original: rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams med pa'i phyir brgyad pa'i sa'i chos rnams dang / mthong ba'i sa'i chos rnams dang / bsrabs pa'i sa'i chos rnams dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa'i chos rnams dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa'i chos rnams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams med pa'i phyir brgyad pa'i sa'i chos rnams dang / mthong ba'i sa'i chos rnams dang / bsrabs pa'i sa'i chos rnams dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa'i chos rnams dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa'i chos rnams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the dharmas of the stage of lineage do not exist, the dharmas of the eighth stage, the dharmas of the seeing stage, the dharmas of the thinning stage, the dharmas of the desireless stage, and the dharmas of the stage of realizing what is to be done do not exist.

original: byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa'i chos rnams med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa'i chos rnams med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the dharmas of the stage of realizing what is to be done do not exist, space does not exist.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because space does not exist, the Great Vehicle does not exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the Great Vehicle does not exist, immeasurable, innumerable, and limitless do not exist.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Because the limitless do not exist, all dharmas do not exist.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: Subhūti, thus that Great Vehicle does not liberate incalculable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: and the immeasurable and incalculable.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self and all dharmas up to the knower and the seer are non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the non-existence of a self, there is no sentient being, up to no knower and no seer.

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa med par rig @307a *//
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa med par rig @307a *//
translated: You should know that because of the non-existence of a knower and a seer, there is no stream enterer.

original: par bya'o // rgyun du zhugs pa med pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: par bya'o // rgyun du zhugs pa med pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the non-existence of a stream enterer, there is no once-returner.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the non-existence of a once-returner, there is no non-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba med pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba med pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the non-existence of a non-returner, there is no arhat.

original: dgra bcom pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang / theg pa chen po dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar du med par rig par bya ste /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang / theg pa chen po dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar du med par rig par bya ste / rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: and that it is immeasurable, incalculable, and limitless, up to the non-existence of all dharmas.

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in this way the Great Vehicle makes room for infinite, incalculable, limitless beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self and all dharmas up to the end of all dharmas are non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, one should know that because of the non-existence of the self, beings do not exist, up to knowers and seers do not exist.

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because knowers and seers do not exist, one should know that pratyekabuddhas do not exist.

original: rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there are no pratyekabuddhas, you should know that there are no bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there are no bodhisattvas, you should know that there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no space, you should know that there is no Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa @307b dang; tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa @307b dang; tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Great Vehicle, you should know that there are no immeasurables, no countless, and no limitless.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Because there are no limitless, you should know that there are no dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: Subhūti, thus that Great Vehicle outshines the immeasurable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: countless, limitless beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self and all dharmas up to the end are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, because of the nonexistence of a self

original: sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: one should know that there are no sentient beings, and so on up to there is no one who knows and no one who sees.

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who knows and no one who sees, one should know that there is no Śrāvaka Vehicle.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Śrāvaka Vehicle, one should know that there is no Pratyekabuddha Vehicle.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Pratyekabuddha Vehicle, one should know that there is no Buddha Vehicle.

original: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Buddha Vehicle, one should know that there is no knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knowledge of all aspects, one should know that there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no space, one should know that there is no Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Great Vehicle, you should know that there are no immeasurables, no countless, and no limitless.

original: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Because there are no immeasurables, you should know that all phenomena do not exist.

original: rab 'byor / @308a *//🔽de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / @308a *// de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med /
translated: Subhūti,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no //
translated: in that way the Great Vehicle makes room for immeasurable, countless, limitless sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self and all phenomena up to and including omniscience are non-apprehensible.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: theg pa de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs /

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs /
translated: the later limit is not apprehended,

original: dbus kyang mi dmigs lags pas /
analyzed: dbus kyang mi dmigs lags pas /
translated: and the middle is not apprehended.

original: de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te /
analyzed: de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te /

original: de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //🔽zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o // zhes smras pa ni /
translated: For that reason, it is called the Great Vehicle.

original: rab 'byor // de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor // de de bzhin no //

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /

original: theg pa chen po de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: theg pa chen po de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs /
translated: The Great Vehicle does not apprehend a prior limit,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs /
translated: does not apprehend a later limit,

original: dbus kyang mi dmigs pas /
analyzed: dbus kyang mi dmigs pas /
translated: and does not apprehend a middle.

original: de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi @311b theg pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi @311b theg pa yin te /

original: de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong /
translated: Subhūti, the past time is empty of the past time,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong /
translated: the future time is empty of the future time,

original: da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong /
translated: and the present time is empty of the present time.

original: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The sameness of the three times is empty of the sameness of the three times.

original: theg pa chen po'ang theg pa chen pos stong; byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang theg pa chen pos stong; byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong la /
translated: the Great Vehicle is empty of the Great Vehicle, and the bodhisattva is empty of the bodhisattva.

original: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid la ni gcig ces bya ba med cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid la ni gcig ces bya ba med cing /
translated: Subhūti, emptiness does not have a single thing,🔽nor does it have a second,

original: gnyis sam / gsum mam /
analyzed: gnyis sam / gsum mam /
translated: nor does it have a third,

original: bzhi'am / lnga'am /
analyzed: bzhi'am / lnga'am /
translated: nor does it have a fourth, nor a fifth,

original: drug gam / bdun nam brgyad dam /
analyzed: drug gam / bdun nam brgyad dam /
translated: nor a sixth, nor a seventh, nor an eighth,

original: dgu'am / bcu zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: dgu'am / bcu zhes bya ba'am /
translated: nor a ninth, nor a tenth,

original: tha dad du dbye ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: tha dad du dbye ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it is not divided into separate parts.

original: de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the vehicle of the sameness of the three times for bodhisattva great beings.

original: theg pa chen po de la ni mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: theg pa chen po de la ni mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: In that Great Vehicle, sameness and difference are not apprehended.

original: de la ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: In it, desire and freedom from desire are not apprehended.

original: zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: Anger and freedom from anger are not apprehended.

original: gti mug dang / gti mug med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gti mug dang / gti mug med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance and freedom from ignorance are not apprehended.

original: ming dang / ming med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ming dang / ming med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: Name and no name are not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba'ang mi dmigs so //🔽zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba'ang mi dmigs so // zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: In the same way, he does not apprehend virtue or nonvirtue.🔽He does not apprehend what is with or without outflows.

original: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'ang mi dmigs so //🔽nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa @312a *//
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'ang mi dmigs so // nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa @312a *//
translated: He does not apprehend what is reprehensible or irreproachable.

original: med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is afflicted or unafflicted.

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das ba'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das ba'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is mundane or supramundane.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang mi dmigs so; ;'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang mi dmigs so; ;'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is defiled or purified. He does not apprehend saṃsāra or nirvāṇa.

original: de la ni rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la ni rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: In this regard, he does not apprehend permanence or impermanence.

original: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend happiness or suffering.

original: bdag dang / bdag med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bdag dang / bdag med pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend a self or a non-self.

original: zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend peace or non-peace.

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: the desire realm and transcending the desire realm are non-apprehensible,

original: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: the form realm and transcending the form realm are non-apprehensible,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: and the formless realm and transcending the formless realm are non-apprehensible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because their essential nature is non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Su­bhūti, past physical forms are empty of past physical forms.

original: de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Similarly, past feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are empty of past consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Su­bhūti, future physical forms are empty of future physical forms.

original: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs @312b pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs @312b pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Similarly, future feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of future consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Su­bhūti, present form is empty of present form.

original: de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: Similarly, present feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of present consciousness.🔽Su­bhūti, past form is empty of past form.🔽Su­bhūti, future form is empty of future form.

original: da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / 'di ltar stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / 'di ltar stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Su­bhūti, present form is empty of present form.🔽Su­bhūti, past feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of past consciousness.🔽Su­bhūti, future feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of future consciousness.🔽Su­bhūti, present feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of present consciousness.🔽Su­bhūti, past form is empty of past form.🔽Su­bhūti, future form is empty of future form.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /🔽stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /🔽stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: Su­bhūti, present form is empty of present form.

original: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang; 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang; 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /
translated: In emptiness, past feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
translated: Since emptiness is empty of emptiness, it is not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness in the past be apprehended in emptiness?

original: de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
analyzed: de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
translated: In the same way, in emptiness, future form is not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
translated: Since emptiness is empty of emptiness, it is not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could future form be apprehended in emptiness?

original: stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /
translated: In emptiness, future feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
translated: Since emptiness is empty of emptiness, it is not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed @313a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed @313a *//
translated: How could the emptiness of the future feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions,

original: rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: and consciousness be apprehended?

original: stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
translated: The present form is non-apprehensible in emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
translated: Since emptiness is empty of emptiness and is therefore non-apprehensible,

original: stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the present form be apprehended in emptiness?🔽The present feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions,

original: stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /
translated: and consciousness are non-apprehensible in emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
translated: Since emptiness is empty of emptiness and is therefore non-apprehensible,🔽how could the present feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions,

original: stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: and consciousness be apprehended in emptiness?

original: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of generosity is not apprehended in the past.

original: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of generosity is not apprehended in the future.

original: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of generosity is not apprehended in the present.

original: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of generosity is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: rab 'byor / mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, in sameness the past time is not apprehended.

original: mnyam pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs so //
translated: In sameness the future time is not apprehended.

original: mnyam pa nyid la ni da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la ni da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
translated: In sameness the present time is not apprehended.

original: mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs na /
translated: If sameness is not apprehended in sameness,🔽how could the past, future, and present perfection of generosity possibly be apprehended in sameness?

original: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la @313b 'gyur; rab 'byor /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la @313b 'gyur; rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, and the perfection of concentration are not apprehended in the past, future, or present.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is not apprehended in the past, future, or present.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /🔽rab 'byor / mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang; da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te / rab 'byor / mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang; da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.🔽Subhūti, in sameness the three times are not apprehended.

original: mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: In sameness, even sameness is not apprehended,🔽so how could the three times be apprehended?

original: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams ni mi dmigs so; ;dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur / rab 'byor / gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams ni mi dmigs so; ;dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
translated: How could the perfection of wisdom of the past, future, and present be apprehended in sameness?🔽“Moreover, Subhūti, the applications of mindfulness are not apprehended in the past, future, or present; the applications of mindfulness are not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: rab 'byor / mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
translated: Subhūti, in sameness the three times are not apprehended.

original: mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even sameness is not apprehended in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs par lta ga @314a *//
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs par lta ga @314a *//
translated: how could the applications of mindfulness of the past, future, and present be apprehended in sameness?

original: la 'gyur / rab 'byor /
analyzed: la 'gyur / rab 'byor /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the right efforts …

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang; stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang; stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
translated: Similarly, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven aspects of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su mi dmigs so //
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended in the past, future, or present.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
translated: Up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: rab 'byor / mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, in sameness the past time is not apprehended,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: the future time is not apprehended,

original: da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
translated: and the present time is not apprehended.

original: mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even sameness is not apprehended in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang; da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang; da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha be apprehended in the sameness of the three times?

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so; ;so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so; ;so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the state of an ordinary being is not apprehended in the past, the state of an ordinary being is not apprehended in the future,

original: so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
translated: the state of an ordinary being is not apprehended in the present,

original: so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
translated: and the state of an ordinary being is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because a sentient being is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, a śrāvaka is not apprehended in the past,

original: rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems @314b dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems @314b dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: a pratyekabuddha, a bodhisattva, or a tathāgata is not apprehended in the past,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: and a tathāgata is not apprehended in the present.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the future.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the present.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because sentient beings are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas te /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should stand in the perfection of wisdom like that,

original: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de ltar bslabs shing /
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de ltar bslabs shing /
translated: should train like that in the sameness of the three times,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: and should complete the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te /
translated: “Subhūti, that is the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings called the sameness of the three times.

original: de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das la /
analyzed: de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro // de nas bcom ldan 'das la /
translated: Abiding in it, the bodhisattva mahāsattva will surpass the world with its devas, humans, and asuras and will go forth to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa chen po 'di legs par bka' stsal pa ni /🔽legs so // legs so /
analyzed: ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa chen po 'di legs par bka' stsal pa ni / legs so // legs so /
translated: it is excellent, excellent that the Lord has spoken well of this Great Vehicle called the sameness of the three times of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.🔽Excellent, Lord!🔽Excellent, Sugata!

original: legs so // bcom ldan 'das /🔽@315a *// 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs nas /
analyzed: legs so // bcom ldan 'das / @315a *// 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs nas /
translated: Lord,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob lags so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob lags so //
translated: past bodhisattva mahāsattvas trained in this Great Vehicle and attained the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Lord,🔽future bodhisattva mahāsattvas will train in this Great Vehicle and attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,🔽present bodhisattva mahāsattvas are training in this Great Vehicle and will attain the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Lord,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di la slob cing /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di la slob cing /
translated: Future bodhisattva great beings will also train in this Great Vehicle

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags so //
translated: and attain the state of omniscience.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,🔽the bodhisattva great beings who are now in the countless,

original: gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa dag na mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu ma mchis /🔽grangs ma mchis /
