analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' la ni mtha' dang / dbus dang / mtha' mi dmigs kyang /
translated: for example, although space has no end, no middle, and no extremes,

original: nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so //
translated: it is designated as “space.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: in the same way, because form is emptiness, the prior limit of form is not apprehended;

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: The future is not apprehended.

original: dbus mi dmigs te /🔽stong pa nyid la ni mtha'am /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te / stong pa nyid la ni mtha'am /

original: dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because emptiness is not apprehended as an end or a middle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /

translated: in the same way, because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are emptiness, the past limit of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not apprehended,

original: phyi @324b ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /

original: dbus mi dmigs te /🔽stong pa nyid la ni mtha'am /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te / stong pa nyid la ni mtha'am /
translated: and the middle is not apprehended.

original: dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because emptiness is not apprehended as an end or a middle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o //
translated: for this reason, because form is limitless, a bodhisattva should be known as limitless.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are boundless, bodhisattvas should be known as boundless.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang; lam dang /

translated: in the same way, the constituents, the sense fields, the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of supernormal  ability, the faculties, the powers, the aspects of enlightenment, the path,

analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no //
translated: the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha are equal to space.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir nam mkha' la mtha'am /
translated: it is like this:🔽for example, space is not observed to have an end or a middle because it is limitless and boundless,

original: dbus mi dmigs kyang nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so //
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs kyang nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so //

original: dbus mi dmigs te /🔽stong pa nyid la mtha'am /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te / stong pa nyid la mtha'am /
translated: in the same way, up to the buddhadharmas, because of emptiness, the buddhadharmas are not apprehended as an end or a middle.

original: dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because emptiness is not apprehended as an end or a middle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o //
translated: for this reason, because the buddhadharmas are limitless, bodhisattvas should be known as limitless.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang yang khyod 'di skad du @325a *//
analyzed: gang yang khyod 'di skad du @325a *//
translated: you asked,🔽“Venerable Subhūti, why is it that ‘form is not existent and is not apprehended’ up to

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin /

analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin zhes zer ba ni / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: and feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not consciousness.

original: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, form is empty of form.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs /🔽stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs / stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs la /
translated: in emptiness there is no form,

original: de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs /
translated: in emptiness there is no feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness;🔽in emptiness there is no eye, no ear, no nose, no tongue, no body, no mind;🔽in emptiness there is no form, no sound, no smell, no taste, no texture, no mental object;🔽in emptiness there is no eye element up to no mind element,🔽no element of visual consciousness up to no element of mental consciousness;

original: stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because emptiness is not a bodhisattva and is not apprehended,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: for this reason, the bodhisattva is not form, and so on up to:

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: the bodhisattva is not feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: in the same way, the perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving,

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @325b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @325b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: stong pa nyid la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing /
translated: in emptiness there is no perfection of wisdom,

original: stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and in emptiness there is no bodhisattva.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /🔽nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,🔽the emptiness of internal phenomena is empty of the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo //
translated: up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is empty of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni; dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni; dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the applications of mindfulness are empty of the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
translated: the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the seven limbs of awakening, the path, the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo //🔽de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo // de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the dharma-constituent is empty of the dharma-constituent,🔽suchness is empty of suchness,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ngo //
translated: the very limit of reality is empty of the very limit of reality,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ngo //
translated: and the inconceivable element is empty of the inconceivable element.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gyis stong ngo //
translated: “The meditative stabilities are empty of the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are empty of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: thams cad @326a *//
analyzed: thams cad @326a *//
translated: All🔽the aspects of the path are empty of the aspects of the path.

original: shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The knowledge of path aspects is empty of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ngo //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ngo // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo //
translated: The Śrāvaka Vehicle is empty of the Śrāvaka Vehicle.🔽The Pratyekabuddha Vehicle is empty of the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle.

original: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo //
translated: The Buddha Vehicle is empty of the Buddha Vehicle.

original: nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ngo //
translated: The śrāvakas are empty of the śrāvakas.

original: rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ngo //
translated: The pratyekabuddhas are empty of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo; ;de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo; ;de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste /
translated: the bodhisattva is empty of the bodhisattva, and the Tathāgata is empty of the Tathāgata.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: in the emptiness of the Tathāgata, form is not found and is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: In the emptiness of the Tathāgata, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not found and are not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: by this method form is not form and is not apprehended.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not consciousness and are not apprehended.🔽Venerable Śāriputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du /
translated: you have said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, why do you say this:

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi @326b thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi @326b thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One,🔽in that way, I do not see any bodhisattva great being at all, in any way,

original: ma dmigs lags na /
analyzed: ma dmigs lags na /
translated: I do not observe any bodhisattva great being at all, in any way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra /🔽zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra / zhes zer ba ni /
translated: so which bodhisattva great being should I instruct and teach in which perfection of wisdom?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzugs ni gzugs la dmigs su med do //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs la dmigs su med do //
translated: form is not observed in form.

original: gzugs ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do //
analyzed: gzugs ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do //
translated: Form is not observed in feeling.

original: tshor ba ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do //
analyzed: tshor ba ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do //
translated: Feeling is not observed in feeling.

original: tshor ba ni gzugs la dmigs su med do //
analyzed: tshor ba ni gzugs la dmigs su med do //
translated: Feeling is not observed in form.

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dag ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do //
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dag ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do //
translated: Form and feeling are not observed in perception.

original: 'du shes ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do //
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do //
translated: Perception is not observed in perception.

original: 'du shes ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dag la dmigs su med do //
analyzed: 'du shes ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dag la dmigs su med do //
translated: Perception does not exist and is not found in form and feeling.

original: 'du byed rnams ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Formulations do not exist and are not found in perception.

original: 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so // 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Formulations do not exist and are not found in formulations.🔽Perception does not exist and is not found in formulations.

original: rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness does not exist and is not found in formulations.

original: 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Formulations do not exist and are not found in consciousness.

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, feeling, and perception do not exist and are not found in formulations.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness does not exist and is not found in consciousness.

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med @327a *//🔽cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med @327a *//🔽cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, feeling, perception, and formulations do not exist and are not found in consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness is not found and is not apprehended in form, feeling, perception, or volitional factors.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the eyes are not found and are not apprehended in the eyes.

original: mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes are not found and are not apprehended in the ears.

original: rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The ears are not found and are not apprehended in the eyes.

original: rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The ears are not found and are not apprehended in the ears.

original: rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The ears are not found and are not apprehended in the nose.

original: sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose is not found and is not apprehended in the nose.

original: sna ni mig dang / rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna ni mig dang / rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose is not found and is not apprehended in the eyes and ears.

original: sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose is not found and is not apprehended in the tongue.

original: lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue is not found and is not apprehended in the tongue.

original: lce ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dag la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dag la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue is not found and is not apprehended in the eyes, ears, and nose.

original: lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue is not found and is not apprehended in the body.

original: lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The body is not found and is not apprehended in the body.

original: lus ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The body does not exist and is not found in the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and body.

original: lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The body does not exist and is not found in the mind.

original: yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind does not exist and is not found in the mind.

original: yid ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind does not exist and is not found in the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and body.

original: gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form does not exist and is not found in form.

original: gzugs ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form does not exist and is not found in sounds, smells, tastes, tangibles, and mental phenomena.

original: sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Sounds do not exist and are not found in sounds.

original: sgra ni gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin du dri ni dri dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing @327b mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sgra ni gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so // de bzhin du dri ni dri dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing @327b mi dmigs so //
translated: Sounds do not exist and are not found in the others.🔽Similarly, smells do not exist and are not found in smells or in the others.

original: ro ni ro dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ro ni ro dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Tastes do not exist and are not found in tastes or in the others.

original: reg bya ni reg bya dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg bya ni reg bya dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Tangibles do not exist and are not found in tangibles or in the others.

original: chos ni chos rnams dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos ni chos rnams dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The phenomena of the eyes are not found and are not apprehended in the phenomena of the eyes.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eye consciousness is not found and is not apprehended in the eye consciousness.

original: gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The other is not found and is not apprehended in it.

original: de dag la'ang de med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de dag la'ang de med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: It is not found and is not apprehended in the other.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni de bzhin te /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni de bzhin te /
translated: The same goes for the ear consciousness, the nose consciousness, the tongue consciousness, the body consciousness, and the mind consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind consciousness is not found and is not apprehended in the mind consciousness.

original: gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The other is not found and is not apprehended in it.

original: de'ang gzhan dag la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni /
analyzed: de'ang gzhan dag la med cing mi dmigs so // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni /
translated: It is not found and is not apprehended in the other.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Eye contact is not found and is not apprehended in eye contact.

original: de ni gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de ni gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: It is not found and is not apprehended in the other.

original: de la gzhan dag kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la gzhan dag kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: And in that regard, the other is not and is not apprehended.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang de bzhin te /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang de bzhin te /
translated: Ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, body contact, and thinking-mind contact are also like that.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Thinking-mind contact is not and is not apprehended in thinking-mind contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang reg pa gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang reg pa gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: And in thinking-mind contact, the other contact is not and is not apprehended.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni /
translated: Feeling that arises from eye contact

original: mig @328a *// gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig @328a *// gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: is not and is not apprehended in feeling that arises from eye contact.

original: de la'ang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la'ang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so; ;rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la'ang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la'ang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so; ;rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: In that, other is not found and is not apprehended.

original: de la'ang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la'ang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni /
analyzed: de la'ang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la'ang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni /
translated: In the other, other is not found and is not apprehended.🔽The applications of mindfulness are not found and are not apprehended in the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so; ;de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so; ;de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
translated: The right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag ni /
translated: The noble eightfold path, the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: are not existent and are not apprehended in the buddhadharmas.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni /
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: are not existent and are not apprehended in the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
translated: The buddhadharmas

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: are not existent and are not apprehended in the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni /
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing @328b mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing @328b mi dmigs so //
translated: are not existent and are not apprehended in the buddhadharmas.

original: chos thams cad ni chos thams cad la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni chos thams cad la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: All dharmas are not existent and are not apprehended in all dharmas.

original: chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: All dharmas are not existent and are not apprehended in the buddhadharmas.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena does not exist in the emptiness of internal phenomena and is not apprehended there.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: does not exist in the other aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, and is not apprehended there.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities does not exist in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities and is not apprehended there.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: does not exist in the other aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness of internal phenomena, and is not apprehended there.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A meditative absorption does not exist in a meditative absorption and is not apprehended there.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A meditative absorption does not exist in dhāraṇī gateways and is not apprehended there.

original: gzungs ni gzungs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs ni gzungs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A dhāraṇī gateway does not exist in a dhāraṇī gateway and is not apprehended there.

original: gzungs ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A dhāraṇī gateway does not exist in a meditative absorption and is not apprehended there.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa ni /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa ni /
translated: The level of an ordinary being

original: so so skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: does not exist on the level of an ordinary being and is not apprehended there.

original: rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /
translated: the level of the spiritual potential, the eighth-lowest level, the level of seeing, the level of freedom from attachment, the level of thinning out , the level of realizing what is to be done, the pratyekabuddha level, the bodhisattva level,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the tathāgata level, and the level of omniscience do not exist and are not found on the level of omniscience.

original: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa ni /
translated: Similarly, a stream enterer

original: rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: does not exist and is not found on the level of a stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang @329a *//🔽sangs rgyas ni /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang @329a *// sangs rgyas ni /
translated: A once-returner, a non-returner, a worthy one, and a pratyekabuddha

original: rang sangs rgyas nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: do not exist and are not found on the level of a pratyekabuddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
translated: A bodhisattva and a perfect buddha

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: do not exist and are not found on the level of a perfect buddha.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: The bodhisattva

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: is not found and is not apprehended in the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //

original: gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni /
translated: Instruction and teaching

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so /
translated: are not found and are not apprehended in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni /
translated: Instruction and teaching

original: gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so //

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: The bodhisattva

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: gang yang khyod 'di skad du /
translated: you asked

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste / de'i phyir 'di lta ste /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes @329b bya'o //

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi ming de ni phyogs bcu gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: gang du'ang mi 'gro'o // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
translated: the name of all phenomena does not come from anywhere or go anywhere.

original: gang du'ang mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: gang du'ang mi 'gro'o //
translated: In the same way, the name ‘bodhisattva’ does not come from anywhere or go anywhere.

original: 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di lta ste /

original: gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin no //
translated: ‘Form,’ ‘feeling,’ ‘perception,’ ‘volitional factors,’ and ‘consciousness’ are all merely names that are temporarily designated.

original: ming gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin /
analyzed: ming gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin /

analyzed: tshor ba ma yin /

original: 'du shes ma yin /
analyzed: 'du shes ma yin /

original: 'du byed rnams ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ma yin /

original: rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin no //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar ming ni ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong la /

analyzed: zhes bya'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

analyzed: gzhan yang 'di lta ste /

analyzed: ming la'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med la /

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /🔽de'i phyir / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te / de'i phyir / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do //

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam ste /
translated: the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom—is just a mere name.

analyzed: ming la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med la /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: it is because both the name and the perfection of wisdom are non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: de'i phyir 'di lta ste /

translated: Therefore, this so-called

translated: bodhisattva is a name that is suddenly given.

translated: This so-called

translated: bodhisattva is just a name.

analyzed: ming la'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag med do //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba de dag ni /

analyzed: de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

translated: ‘Why is it so that all phenomena are essentially unreal?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: it is so.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no intrinsic nature that arises from a combination.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

original: gang gi 'dus pa las byung pa'i ngo bo nyid med /
analyzed: gang gi 'dus pa las byung pa'i ngo bo nyid med /
translated: from the combination of what is there no intrinsic nature that arises?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzugs @333a *// kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gzugs @333a *// kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: there is no intrinsic nature that arises from the combination of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature that arises from the combination of feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: mig gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: there is no intrinsic nature that arises from the combination of the eyes.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Similarly, there is no intrinsic nature that arises from the combination of the ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang; rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang; rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
translated: Similarly, there is no intrinsic nature in forms, sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena, and in the eye consciousness, ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, and mind consciousness.

original: lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature in eye contact, ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, body contact, or mind contact, and there is no intrinsic nature in the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, or the feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: there is no intrinsic nature in the coming together of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po @333b med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po @333b med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: for this reason all phenomena are essentially unreal.

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste /
translated: in addition, all phenomena are impermanent,

analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

analyzed: chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste /
translated: all phenomena are impermanent,

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste /
translated: feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are impermanent,

translated: If you ask why,

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o //
translated: it is because whatever is impermanent is a nonexistent thing that is exhausted.

original: de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ste /

original: gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no //
analyzed: gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no //
translated: but it is not because of being separated from anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o //
translated: it is because whatever is suffering is a nonexistent thing that is exhausted.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste /
translated: supramundane,🔽purified,🔽and unconditioned.

original: gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no //
analyzed: gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no //
translated: They are not unaccompanied by anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po @334a *//
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,🔽it is because what is unconditioned is not a thing that is exhausted.

original: med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: med pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is because what is unconditioned is not a thing that is exhausted.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for this reason

original: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste /
translated: all phenomena are without an intrinsic nature

original: gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no //
analyzed: gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no //
translated: and are not unaccompanied by anything.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
translated: in addition, all phenomena are not stable

original: 'jig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig pa ma yin no //
translated: and are not destroyed.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
translated: Why are all dharmas not permanent,

original: 'jig pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'jig pa ma yin /
translated: not perishable?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
translated: form is not permanent,

original: 'jig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not perishable.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its nature is such.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
translated: feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not permanent,

original: 'jig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig pa ma yin no //
translated: they are not perishable.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because their nature is such.🔽Similarly, wholesome and unwholesome, reprehensible and not reprehensible,

original: de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /
translated: with and without outflows, and with and without afflictions,

original: nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
translated: the uncontaminated, the mundane, the supramundane, the conditioned, the unconditioned, the phenomena of affliction and purification, saṃsāra and nirvāṇa are not permanent,

original: 'jig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig pa ma yin no //
translated: and they are not annihilated.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang @334b bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang @334b bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their intrinsic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: by this one of many explanations, all phenomena are the intrinsic nature of non-entityness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /🔽gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags /
analyzed: gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags /
translated: you asked, ‘Why is it that the form that is established is not form?’

original: gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags zhes smra /🔽zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags zhes smra / zhes zer ba ni /
translated: What is the feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness that is formed?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
translated: form is unformed.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are unformed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because there is no one who forms.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: mig ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: mig ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
translated: the eyes are unformed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because there is no one who forms.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are non-composite.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because there is no agent of composition.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
translated: form, sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects are non-composite.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //🔽chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang mngon par @335a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang mngon par @335a *//
translated: It is because the agent of composition is not apprehended.

original: 'dus ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa'o //
translated: Up to all phenomena are non-composite.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because the agent of composition is not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gzugs dang; tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gzugs dang; tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o //
translated: For this reason, form, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are said to be non-arising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir /
analyzed: gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir /
translated: you asked why I said that

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa de /
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa de /
translated: that which is non-arising

original: gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs ma lags /
translated: is not form,

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags zhes smra /🔽zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags zhes smra / zhes zer ba ni /
translated: and that which is non-arising is not feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /🔽de de bzhin te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / de de bzhin te /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: it is so, it is so!🔽It is just as you have said.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
translated: it is like this: form is empty by nature.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do //
translated: That which is empty by nature does not arise and does not cease.

original: gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
translated: That which does not arise and does not cease does not come or go.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
translated: Likewise, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of a basic nature.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing /🔽'jig pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing / 'jig pa med do //
translated: That which is empty of a basic nature does not arise and does not pass away.🔽That which does not arise and does not pass away does not come to be and does not disintegrate.

original: gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de la gzhan du 'gyur pa med do //
analyzed: gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de la gzhan du 'gyur pa med do //
translated: That which does not come to be and does not disintegrate does not decrease.

original: chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
translated: All dharmas, up to and including omniscience, are empty of a basic nature.

original: gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do //
translated: Those that are empty of a basic nature do not arise and do not pass away.🔽Those that do not arise and do not pass away do not come to be and do not disintegrate.

original: gang dag @335b la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: gang dag @335b la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de /
translated: Those that do not come to be and do not disintegrate do not decrease.

original: rnam grangs des na gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //
translated: For this reason, Venerable Śāriputra, that which is not produced is not form.

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang; 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang; 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is not produced is not feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir /
analyzed: gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir /
translated: You say,

original: ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra /
analyzed: ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra /
translated: “Why is it that you say, ‘Should one who is not established instruct and teach one who is not established in the perfection of wisdom?’”

original: zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: zhes zer ba ni /
translated: You say that.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: it is like this: that which is not established is the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste /
translated: That which is the perfection of wisdom is not established.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de /
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de /
translated: Thus, that which is not established and the perfection of wisdom are not two, nor are they divided.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na kho bos 'di skad du /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na kho bos 'di skad du /
translated: because of this one of many explanations, I say that

original: ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam /
analyzed: ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, is it the non-establishment of the non-established that should be instructed in and taught the perfection of wisdom?”

original: zhes smras so //
analyzed: zhes smras so //
translated: he said.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /🔽gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so zhes smra /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so zhes smra /
translated: you say, ‘Why is it that apart from non-establishment, a bodhisattva great being practicing for awakening is not apprehended?’

original: zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: zhes zer ba ni /
translated: This is what they say.🔽🔽

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /🔽'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @336a *//
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @336a *//
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,🔽it is because a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par ma grub pa'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par ma grub pa'ang gzhan la /
translated: does not apprehend anything other than non-establishment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste; de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste; de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: He does not consider the bodhisattva as one thing and non-production as another. Thus, non-production and the bodhisattva are not two nor divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not consider form as one thing and non-production as another.

original: mngon par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: He does not consider feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as one thing and non-production as another.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: Thus, form and non-production are not two nor divided.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: Thus, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness and non-production are not two nor divided.

original: de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: In the same way, they do not see any dharma at all apart from non-production, up to:

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: Thus, non-production and all dharmas are not two, nor are they divided.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no ////
analyzed: rnam grangs des na mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no ////
translated: by this one of many explanations, apart from non-production, the bodhisattva great being who practices for awakening is not apprehended.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in Eighteen Thousand Lines

original: bam po bcu bdun pa /
analyzed: bam po bcu bdun pa /
translated: Eighteenth

original: tshe dang ldan @336b pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan @336b pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir /
analyzed: gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir /
translated: you asked, “Why is it called the perfection of wisdom?”

original: gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'god zhing /
analyzed: gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'god zhing /
translated: If, when it is being taught like this, the minds of bodhisattva great beings do not become cowed, do not become crushed,

original: yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la; mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la; mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na /
translated: and will not be afraid, terrified, or fearful,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra /🔽zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra / zhes zer ba ni /
translated: then you should know that bodhisattva great being is practicing the perfection of wisdom.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad g-yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad g-yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing /
translated: it is because bodhisattva great beings see all phenomena as unmoving,

original: chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste /
translated: and see all phenomena as like a dream, like an illusion, like a mirage, like an echo, like an apparition, like a reflection of the moon in water, and like a magical creation.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /🔽bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni / bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag /
translated: For this reason, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das la /
analyzed: mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro // de nas bcom ldan 'das la /
translated: they do not tremble, feel frightened, or become terrified when they hear this teaching.
