original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: ” Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom and investigate those dharmas in that way,

original: gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
translated: at that time they do not accept or grasp form,

original: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi @337a *//
analyzed: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi @337a *//
translated: do not make it their abode, do not settle down on it,

original: bgyid cing / 'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: bgyid cing / 'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: and do not label it ‘this is form.’

original: de'i tshe tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa khas mi len cing /
analyzed: de'i tshe tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa khas mi len cing /
translated: At that time they do not accept or grasp feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,🔽do not make it their abode,

original: mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: mi 'dzin la /
translated: do not settle down on it,🔽and do not label it ‘this is consciousness.’

original: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
analyzed: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
translated: They do not stand upon it and do not settle down on it.

original: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: They do not designate it as consciousness.

original: de bzhin du de'i tshe mig khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i tshe mig khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
translated: Similarly, at that time they do not accept or grasp the eyes,

original: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
analyzed: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
translated: do not stand upon them and do not settle down on them.

original: 'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: They do not designate them as the eyes.

original: de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba dang; sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba dang; sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
translated: Similarly, at that time they do not accept or grasp the ears, nose, tongue, body, or thinking mind,

original: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
analyzed: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
translated: do not stand upon them and do not settle down on them.

original: 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: They do not designate them as the thinking mind.

original: de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
translated: At that time they do not accept or grasp the perfection of giving,

original: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
analyzed: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
translated: do not stand upon it and do not settle down on it.

original: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: They do not designate it as the perfection of giving.

original: de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
translated: Similarly, at that time they do not accept or grasp at the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
analyzed: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
translated: They do not stand in them and do not settle down on them.

original: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha @337b rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha @337b rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: They do not designate them as ‘the perfection of wisdom.’

original: de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
translated: At that time they do not accept or grasp at inner emptiness,

original: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
analyzed: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
translated: they do not stand in it and do not settle down on it.

original: 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: They do not designate it as ‘inner emptiness.’

original: de bzhin du de'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i tshe /
translated: Similarly, at that time

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
translated: they do not accept or grasp at . . . up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
analyzed: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
translated: They do not stand in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities and do not settle down on it.

original: 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: They do not designate it as ‘the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: further, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
translated: do not accept or grasp the applications of mindfulness.

original: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
analyzed: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
translated: They do not stand in them and do not settle down on them.

original: 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: They do not designate them as ‘the applications of mindfulness.’

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe /
translated: Similarly, at that time, bodhisattvas

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang; stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang; stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
translated: the fearlessnesses,🔽the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /🔽gnas par mi bgyid do /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /🔽'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos @338a *//🔽rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la / gnas par mi bgyid do / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos @338a *// rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la /
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not accept or grasp the gateways to the dhāraṇīs or the gateways to samādhi.

original: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
analyzed: gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /
translated: they do not stand in them and do not settle down on them,🔽and they do not label them as ‘these are the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so //
translated: These are not designated as the doors of meditative stabilization and dhāraṇī.”🔽

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: And why is that, Lord?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Lord, it is because bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not see form,

original: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: and similarly do not see the aggregates, elements, or sense fields,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: do not see the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: do not see the perfections,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o //
translated: up to do not see the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste /
translated: it is because form is unborn.

original: gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: The non-arising of form is not form.

original: de ltar na gzugs dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, form and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: @338b de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: @338b de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: it is because non-arising is not one,

original: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: nor is it many.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
translated: The non-arising of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lags so //
analyzed: mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lags so //
translated: The non-arising of the eyes is not the eyes.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lags so //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lags so //
translated: The non-arising of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind is not the thinking mind.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so //
translated: That non-production of the perfection of giving is not the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: That non-production of the perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration, and perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the perfection of wisdom and that non-production are not two, nor are they divided.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so //
translated: That non-production of inner emptiness is not inner emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te /
translated: The non-arising of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is not the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis @339a *//
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis @339a *//
translated: Thus, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things and non-arising are not two,

original: su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags te /
translated: the non-arising of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the applications of mindfulness and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang; stobs bcu dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang; stobs bcu dang /
translated: Similarly, the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, the path, the fearlessnesses, the clairvoyances, the ten powers,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not the non-arising of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: Because the non-arising of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa ste /
translated: Thus, suchness is unborn.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te /
translated: The non-arising of suchness is not suchness.

original: de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing @339b gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing @339b gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, suchness and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: it is because non-arising is not one,

original: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: nor is it many.

original: de'i slad du de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the non-arising of suchness is not suchness.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so; ;de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so; ;de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: That nonerroneous suchness, that unaltered suchness, that reality, that expanse of reality, that suchness of phenomena, that establishment of phenomena, that certification of phenomena, that very limit of reality, and that inconceivable expanse—that nonproduction is not the inconceivable expanse. And why?

original: 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das /🔽byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das /🔽byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te /
translated: Because that inconceivable expanse and that nonproduction are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the knowledge of all aspects and non-production are not two and are not divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: it is because non-production is not one

original: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: and is not many.

original: de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Therefore, the knowledge of all aspects and non-production are not two and are not divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das @340a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das @340a *//
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste /
translated: it is because form is impermanent.

original: gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so //
translated: Whatever is the decrease of form is not form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te /
translated: Whatever is the decrease of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: de ltar na phung po rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na phung po rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: the decrease are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Why is that?🔽Blessed One, it is because the decrease is not one,

original: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: nor is it many.

original: khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te /
analyzed: khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te /
translated: The decrease of the constituents and sense fields is not the constituents and sense fields.

original: de ltar na khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the constituents and sense fields and the decrease are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni /
translated: Blessed One,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te /
translated: the decrease of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.

original: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the perfection of generosity and the decrease are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te /
translated: Similarly, the degeneration of the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu @340b phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu @340b phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the perfection of wisdom and its degeneration are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Blessed One,

original: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: it is because degeneration is neither one nor many.

original: de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the degeneration of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te /
translated: The decrease of inner emptiness is not inner emptiness.

original: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, inner emptiness and its decrease are not dual and are not divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Why is that?

original: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is because a decrease is neither one nor many.

original: de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so //🔽de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni /
analyzed: de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so // de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni /
translated: Therefore, the decrease of inner emptiness is not inner emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te /
translated: Similarly, the decrease of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is not the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities and its decrease are not dual and are not divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /🔽mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags / mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags @341a *//
analyzed: de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags @341a *//
translated: it is because the decrease of the emptiness of essential nature with respect to non-entities is not the emptiness of essential nature with respect to non-entities.

original: so; ;bcom ldan 'das /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni /
analyzed: so; ;bcom ldan 'das / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni /
translated: Blessed One,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags te /
translated: the decrease of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the applications of mindfulness and their decrease are not a duality and are not divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Blessed One,

original: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: it is because the decrease is not one and is not many.

original: de'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the decrease of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags te /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags te /
translated: The decrease of the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and eightfold noble path is not the noble path.

original: de ltar na lam dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na lam dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the path and its decrease are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Blessed One,🔽it is because the decrease is not one,

original: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: nor is it many.

original: de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the decrease of the path is not the path.

original: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma @341b 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma @341b 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te /
translated: Similarly, the degeneration of the superknowledges, the fearlessnesses, the correct understandings, the ten powers, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas is not the distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so //
translated: Thus, the distinct qualities of the buddhas and their degeneration are not a duality and are not divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Blessed One,

original: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: it is because degeneration is neither singular nor multiple.

original: de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the degeneration of the distinct qualities of the buddhas is not the distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
analyzed: gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
translated: Whatever is called ‘form’ is counted as not two.

original: de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
translated: Similarly, whatever is called ‘feeling,’ ‘perception,’ ‘volitional formations,’ and ‘consciousness’ is counted as not two.

original: gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
analyzed: gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
translated: Up to whatever is called ‘the knowledge of all aspects’ is counted as not two.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Eighteen Thousand Lines,

original: gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o ////
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o ////
translated: this is chapter twenty, “Nonduality.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāriputra🔽said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog //
translated: How do bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom investigate these dharmas?”

original: tshe @342a *// dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe @342a *// dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin /
translated: what is a bodhisattva?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin /
translated: What is the perfection of wisdom?

original: nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin /
analyzed: nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin /
translated: What is the investigation?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: you ask, ‘What is a bodhisattva?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas /
analyzed: byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas /
translated: because a bodhisattva is just awakening,

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: therefore it is called ‘bodhisattva.’

original: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: And through that awakening, all dharmas are known,

original: chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do //
analyzed: chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do //
translated: but they do not settle down on those dharmas.

original: chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes she na /
analyzed: chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes she na /
translated: What are the aspects of those dharmas that are known?

original: gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: The aspects of form are known,

original: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: And he has no attachment to that.🔽

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te /
translated: He knows the aspects of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness,

original: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on them.

original: de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: Similarly, he knows the aspects of the constituents, the sense fields, dependent origination, and the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on them.

original: stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: He knows the aspects of the powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on them.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin /
translated: what are the aspects of all dharmas?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang @342b ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang @342b ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste /
translated: What are the aspects, what are the signs, and what are the marks by which phenomena are apprehended?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / gzugs rnams sam /
analyzed: rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / gzugs rnams sam /
translated: The aspects, signs, and marks by which conditioned and unconditioned phenomena, forms,

original: sgra rnams sam /🔽dri rnams sam /🔽ro rnams sam /
analyzed: sgra rnams sam / dri rnams sam / ro rnams sam /
translated: sounds,🔽smells,🔽tastes,

original: reg bya rnams sam /
analyzed: reg bya rnams sam /
translated: tactile objects,

original: chos rnams sam /
analyzed: chos rnams sam /
translated: and mental phenomena,

original: nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa ste /
translated: inner and outer phenomena are apprehended,

original: de ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: are called the aspects of all phenomena.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang yang khyod 'di skad du /
analyzed: gang yang khyod 'di skad du /
translated: you asked

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: ‘What is the perfection of wisdom?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste /
analyzed: gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste /
translated: that by which the perfection of wisdom is called has gone far away.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang las ring du song zhe na /
analyzed: gang las ring du song zhe na /
translated: Where does it go far away?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las ring du song /
analyzed: phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las ring du song /
translated: it goes far away from the aggregates, elements, sense bases, and dependent origination.

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song /
translated: It goes far away from all afflictions and all views.

original: 'gro ba drug las ring du song ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba drug las ring du song ste /
translated: It goes far away from the six destinies.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the perfection of going far.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song @343a *//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song @343a *//
translated: It goes far away from the perfection of generosity, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, and the perfection of concentration.

original: ste / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ste / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the perfection of going far.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste /
translated: He has gone far from inner emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called “gone far. ”

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ste /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ste /
translated: He has gone far from the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this perfection of wisdom is called “gone far. ”

original: stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag las ring du song ste /
analyzed: stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag las ring du song ste /
translated: He has gone far from the powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this perfection of wisdom is called “gone far. ”

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste /
translated: They have gone far from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this perfection of wisdom is called ‘gone far.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste /
translated: by this one of many explanations it is so:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: this perfection of wisdom is called ‘gone far.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang yang khyod 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gang yang khyod 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: as for what you said, ‘What is the investigation?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /🔽gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi @343b rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni / gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi @343b rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽do not investigate form as permanent or impermanent,

original: gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: do not investigate form as happy or suffering,

original: gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of form as a self or not a self.

original: gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of form as calm or not calm.

original: gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of form as empty or not empty.

original: gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of form as with signs or signless.

original: gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of form as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of form as isolated or not isolated.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: Similarly, they do not form mental images of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness as permanent or impermanent.

original: rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of consciousness as happiness or suffering.

original: rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of consciousness as a self or not a self.

original: rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of consciousness as calm or not calm.

original: rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of consciousness as empty or not empty.

original: rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of consciousness as with signs or signless.

original: rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of consciousness as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /🔽de bzhin @344a *//
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /🔽de bzhin @344a *//
translated: They do not form mental images of consciousness as isolated or not isolated.🔽They do not form mental images of the eyes as entities or non-entities.

original: du; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: du; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: He does not get close to the idea that the perfection of generosity, the perfection of conduct, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of meditation,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: or the perfection of wisdom is permanent or impermanent.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
translated: In the same vein, he does not get close to the idea that the perfection of wisdom is imbued with happiness or suffering, a self or not a self, peace or not peace, empty or not empty,

original: mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of the notion that it is not empty, or of the notion that it is with signs, or of the notion that it is signless, or of the notion that it is with aspirations, or of the notion that it is without aspirations, or of the notion that it is isolated, or of the notion that it is not isolated.

original: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Similarly, they do not form mental images of the notion that inner emptiness is permanent or that it is impermanent.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: In the same vein, they do not form mental images of the notions that , up to and including the emptiness of essential nature with respect to non-entities, are permanent or that they are impermanent.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go /🔽dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go /🔽dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental images of the notion that the emptiness of essential nature with respect to non-entities is empty or that it is not empty, up to the notion that it is isolated or that it is not isolated.

original: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: Similarly, they do not form concepts about the applications of mindfulness as being permanent or impermanent.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Similarly, they do not form mental images of the applications of mindfulness as being permanent or impermanent.🔽In the same vein, they do not form mental images of , up to and including the noble eightfold path, as being permanent or impermanent.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams @344b dang; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams @344b dang; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
translated: Similarly, they do not form mental images of the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, all the meditative stabilities, all the dhāraṇī gateways, and the knowledge of all aspects as being permanent or impermanent.

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang /
translated: He does not entertain the notion that it is pleasant or that it is unpleasant, that it is a self or that it is not a self, that it is calm or that it is not calm, that it is empty or that it is not empty,🔽that it has an essence or that it is essence-less, that it is arising or that it is ceasing, that it is defiled or that it is purified, that it is past, future, or present, that it is internal or that it is external, that it is coarse or that it is subtle, or that it is powerful or that it is weak.🔽He does not entertain the notion that it is happiness or that it is suffering, that it is a self or that it is not a self, that it is calm or that it is not calm, that it is empty or that it is not empty,🔽that it has an essence or that it is essence-less, that it is arising or that it is ceasing, that it is defiled or that it is purified, that it is past, future, or present, that it is internal or that it is external, that it is coarse or that it is subtle, or that it is powerful or that it is weak.

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog ste /
translated: He does not entertain the notion that it is happiness or that it is suffering, that it is a self or that it is not a self, that it is calm or that it is not calm, that it is empty or that it is not empty,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni; chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do //🔽sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni; chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do // sh'a ri'i bus smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: that it has an essence or that it is essence-less, that it is arising or that it is ceasing, that it is defiled or that it is purified, that it is past, future, or present, that it is internal or that it is external, that it is coarse or that it is subtle, or that it is powerful or that it is weak.🔽He does not entertain the notion that it is happiness or that it is suffering, that it is a self or that it is not a self, that it is calm or that it is not calm, that it is empty or that it is not empty,

original: ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du /
analyzed: ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du /
translated: that it has an essence or that it is essence-less, that it is arising or that it is ceasing, that it is defiled or that it is purified, that it is past, future, or present, that it is internal or that it is external, that it is coarse or that it is subtle, or that it is powerful or that it is weak.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so //
translated: “Blessed One, the non-arising of form is not form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
translated: The non-arising of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: de bzhin @345a *//
analyzed: de bzhin @345a *//
translated: Similarly,

original: du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
analyzed: du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
translated: the non-arising of the constituents, the sense fields, dependent origination, the perfections, all the emptinesses, the dharmas on the side of awakening, the powers, the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so //

analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te /

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te /

analyzed: skye ba med do //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //

translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

translated: In the same way, the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, path, ten powers, fearlessnesses, and forms of correct understanding,

translated: meditative stabilizations, dhāraṇī gateways, buddhadharmas, and knowledge of all aspects are empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do //
translated: is not the knowledge of all aspects. It is non-arisen.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

analyzed: rnam grangs des na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //

analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

analyzed: ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du /

analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
translated: The decrease of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos @346b rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos @346b rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags /

original: zhes zer / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /

translated: whatever is a decrease, whatever is feeling, notion, co-producing factors, and consciousness,

analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa / bstan du med pa /

original: thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //

original: khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /

translated: The constituents, the sense fields, dependent origination, the perfections, the dharmas on the side of awakening, all the emptinesses, the ten powers, the fearlessnesses,
