analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin te /
translated: The correct understandings, the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha, and the knowledge of all aspects are also like that.🔽Thus, Venerable Śāriputra, all those dharmas—

original: de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos @347a *//🔽de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos @347a *// de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: whatever the decline of form might be, whatever the knowledge of all aspects might be, and whatever the nonduality might be—

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing /🔽gzugs med pa /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa /
translated: are not conjoined and not disjoined;

original: bstan du med pa /
analyzed: bstan du med pa /
translated: they are not manifest;

original: thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: they do not obstruct;

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: they are a single taste, the taste of unimpededness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //
translated: because of this one of many explanations, the decline of form is not form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the decline of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The diminution of the knowledge of all modes is not the knowledge of all modes.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du /
analyzed: ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du /
translated: why do you say,

original: gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
analyzed: gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
translated: “‘Form’ is reckoned as a nondual number.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
translated: ‘Feeling, perception, volitional forces, and consciousness’ is reckoned as a nondual number.

original: gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
analyzed: gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
translated: Up to ‘the knowledge of all modes’ is reckoned as a nondual number.”

original: zhes smra / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: zhes smra / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la /
translated: it is because nonproduction is not one thing and

original: gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te /🔽skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
analyzed: gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te / skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
translated: Form is not other than non-arising.🔽Non-arising itself is form.

original: gzugs nyid @347b kyang skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs nyid @347b kyang skye ba med pa'o //
translated: Form itself is non-arising.

original: skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la /
translated: Non-arising is not other than

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Non-arising itself is consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste /
translated: Consciousness itself is non-arising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang yang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang yang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
translated: by this one of many explanations, whatever is called ‘form’ is made into an enumeration of non-duality.

original: gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
analyzed: gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
translated: Whatever is called ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness’ is made into an enumeration of non-duality.

original: khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
analyzed: khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
translated: dependent origination, the perfections, the factors of awakening, all the emptinesses, the ten powers, the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la; skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la; skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: it is thus: the knowledge of all aspects is not one thing and nonproduction another.🔽Nonproduction is itself the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is itself nonproduction.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu; rnam grangs des na gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu; rnam grangs des na gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, by this one of many explanations, that which is called ‘the knowledge of all aspects’ is made into a non-dual number.🔽Then the Lord🔽the venerable Subhūti said this to the Lord:

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la /🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab @348a *//🔽'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la / tshe dang ldan pa rab @348a *// 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,🔽when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom investigate those dharmas in that way, then they see the nonproduction of form because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the perfection of giving, perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration, and perfection of wisdom because of its utter purity.

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: They see the nonproduction of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening because of its utter purity.

original: gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
translated: They see the nonproduction of the emptinesses, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the four formless absorptions because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the perfections, the powers, the clairvoyances, the ten powers of a tathāgata, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all aspects because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of path aspects because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all bases because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all kinds of existence because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all bases because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all kinds of existence because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all bases because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all kinds of existence because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all bases because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all kinds of existence because of its utter purity.🔽They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all bases because of its utter purity.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
translated: They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all kinds of existence because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: They see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all bases because of its utter purity.

original: bdag gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so; ;shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: bdag gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so; ;shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: I see the non-production of a self.

original: sems can dang / srog dang / gso pa dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //🔽de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /🔽khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
analyzed: sems can dang / srog dang / gso pa dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so // de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du / khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
translated: I see the non-production of a sentient being, a living being, one who lives, a human, a human being, a person, one born of strength, a mighty one, one who does, one who feels, one who knows, one who sees, because of utter purity.🔽I see the non-production of the constituents and sense-spheres, because of utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: I see the non-production of dependent origination, because of utter purity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //🔽de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //🔽de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: I see the non-production of the perfection of giving, because of utter purity.🔽I see the non-production of the perfection of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom, because of utter purity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin @348b pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin @348b pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: “Because of being extremely pure, they see the non-production of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: “Because of being extremely pure, they see the non-production of inner emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
translated: “Because of being extremely pure, they see the non-production of . . . up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽“Because of being extremely pure, they see the non-production of the applications of mindfulness.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: “Because of being extremely pure, they see the non-production of the right efforts.🔽“Because of being extremely pure, they see the non-production of the legs of miraculous power.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽“Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the perfection of giving.🔽“Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration, and perfection of wisdom.🔽“Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.🔽“Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the ten powers, four fearlessnesses, four detailed and thorough knowledges, and eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
analyzed: gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the perfection of giving.🔽“Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration, and perfection of wisdom.🔽“Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.🔽“Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the ten powers, four fearlessnesses, four detailed and thorough knowledges, and eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: so so'i skye bo'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the perfection of giving.🔽“Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration, and perfection of wisdom.🔽“Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.

original: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they see the nonproduction of the ten powers, four fearlessnesses, four detailed and thorough knowledges, and eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
translated: the stream enterer and the dharmas of the stream enterer, the once-returner and the dharmas of the once-returner, the non-returner and the dharmas of the non-returner, the arhat and

original: dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs @349a *//
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs @349a *//
translated: the dharmas of the arhat, the pratyekabuddha and🔽the dharmas of the pratyekabuddha, the bodhisattva and

original: rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
analyzed: rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
translated: the dharmas of the bodhisattva, and the non-production of the Buddha and

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so //
translated: the non-production of the dharmas of the Buddha.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, as I understand the meaning of what you have said,

original: gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin /
translated: form is non-production,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med pa yin /🔽khams rnams skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med pa yin / khams rnams skye ba med pa yin /
translated: feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are non-arising;🔽the constituents are non-arising;

original: skye mched rnams skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: skye mched rnams skye ba med pa yin /
translated: the sense fields are non-arising;

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin /
translated: dependent origination is non-arising;

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams skye ba med pa yin /
translated: the perfections are non-arising;

original: stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin /
translated: all the emptinesses are non-arising;

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin /
translated: the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are non-arising;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin /
translated: the meditative stabilizations and dhāraṇī gateways are non-arising;

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba med pa yin /
translated: the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-arising;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin /
translated: even the knowledge of all aspects is non-arising;

original: so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med pa yin /
translated: even an ordinary person is non-arising;

original: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin /
translated: The qualities of ordinary beings are also unborn.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang @349b phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang @349b phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
translated: The stream enterer and the qualities of the stream enterer, the once-returner and the qualities of the once-returner, the non-returner and the qualities of the non-returner, the arhat and

original: dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin /
translated: the qualities of the arhat, the pratyekabuddha and the qualities of the pratyekabuddha, the bodhisattva and the qualities of the bodhisattva, and the Buddha and

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no //
translated: the qualities of the Buddha are also unborn.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med la /
analyzed: gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med la /
translated: if form is unborn

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa yin na ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa yin na ni /
translated: and the qualities of the Buddha are also unborn,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: nyan thos kyis kyang /
analyzed: nyan thos kyis kyang /
translated: Śrāvakas

original: nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur ram /
translated: would already have attained the śrāvaka enlightenment,

original: de de bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang /
analyzed: de de bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang /
translated: and likewise, ordinary beings

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur ram /
translated: would already have attained the pratyekabuddha enlightenment, and likewise, bodhisattvas would already have attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'gro ba rnam pa lnga'ang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnam pa lnga'ang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The five kinds of beings would also be indistinguishable.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub rnam pa lnga'ang thob zin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub rnam pa lnga'ang thob zin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas would already have attained the five kinds of enlightenment.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin na /🔽ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin na / ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
translated: if all phenomena are non-arising,🔽why does the stream enterer cultivate the path in order to abandon the three fetters?

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
translated: Why does the once-returner cultivate the path in order to weaken attachment, aversion, and delusion?

original: phyir mi 'ong bas ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /🔽dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang @350a *//
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong bas ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya / dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang @350a *//
translated: Non-returners cultivate the path in order to abandon the five fetters associated with the lower realms.

original: mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
translated: Arhats cultivate the path in order to abandon the five fetters associated with the higher realms.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis ni rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis ni rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
translated: Those in the Vehicle of the Solitary Buddhas cultivate the path in order to attain the awakening of a solitary buddha.

original: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong bar byed /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong bar byed /
translated: Why do Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas undergo hardships and experience suffering for the sake of sentient beings?

original: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
translated: Why did the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment?

original: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
translated: Why did the Tathāgata turn the wheel of the Dharma?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that there is attainment and clear realization of a nonarisen phenomenon.

original: kho bo ni ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: kho bo ni ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that there is a stream enterer in the nonarisen,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / skye ba med pa la rang byang chub dang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / skye ba med pa la rang byang chub dang /
translated: nor do I assert that there is the result of stream enterer.🔽I do not assert that there is a once-returner, the result of a once-returner, a non-returner, the result of a non-returner, a worthy one, or the result of a worthy one in the nonarisen,

original: rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: nor do I assert that there is a pratyekabuddha or a pratyekabuddha’s awakening in the nonarisen.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod de /
analyzed: kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod de /
translated: I do not assert that a bodhisattva practices austerities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba'i 'du @350b shes kyis mi spyod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba'i 'du @350b shes kyis mi spyod do //
translated: Bodhisattva great beings do not practice with the idea that it is difficult.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar dka' ba'i 'du shes la gnas pas ni /🔽sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: 'di ltar dka' ba'i 'du shes la gnas pas ni / sems can dpag tu med /
translated: it is because those who live with the idea that it is difficult🔽are unable to benefit countless,

original: grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: immeasurable sentient beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'on kyang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed na sems can dpag tu med /
analyzed: 'on kyang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed na sems can dpag tu med /
translated: however, if they generate the idea of father, generate the idea of mother, generate the idea of child, and generate the idea of self, they are able to benefit countless,

original: grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par nus so //
analyzed: grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par nus so //
translated: immeasurable sentient beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: bodhisattva great beings should generate the thought,

original: ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya ba'ang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya ba'ang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad /
translated: ‘Just as the so-called self is completely

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la'ang de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la'ang de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should generate the mind with regard to external and internal phenomena.

original: gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur na /
translated: If one generates such a perception,

original: dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: one will not generate the perception of difficulty.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad kyi thams cad /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad kyi thams cad /
translated: Why is that?

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the bodhisattva mahāsattva does not take up or apprehend any dharma at all, in any way at all.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: kho bo ni skye ba med pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: kho bo ni skye ba med pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the Tathāgata exists in non-arising.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do //🔽chos ma skyes pas kyang 'thob pa ma skyes @351a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do // chos ma skyes pas kyang 'thob pa ma skyes @351a *//
translated: I do not assert that unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and the turning of the wheel of the Dharma exist.

original: pa 'thob par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: pa 'thob par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that non-arising obtains non-arising.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /🔽ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob bam /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob bam /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,🔽is the attainment of a non-arisen phenomenon attained by an arisen attainment,

original: 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyi 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob /
analyzed: 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyi 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob /
translated: or is the attainment of an arisen phenomenon attained by a non-arisen attainment?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod la /
analyzed: kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod la /
translated: I do not assert that the attainment of a non-arisen phenomenon is attained by an arisen attainment,

analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod do //
translated: nor do I assert that the attainment of an arisen phenomenon is attained by a non-arisen attainment.”

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /🔽ci 'thob pa'ang med la /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / ci 'thob pa'ang med la /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: mngon par rtogs pa'ang med dam /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'ang med dam /
translated: is there no attainment and no clear realization,🔽or is there attainment and clear realization?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /🔽'thob pa'ang yod /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / 'thob pa'ang yod /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: mngon par rtogs pa'ang yod de /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'ang yod de /
translated: there is attainment and there is clear realization,

original: gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: but not by the method of duality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dag ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o //
analyzed: 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dag ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o //
translated: Attainment and realization are designated by worldly convention.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'am /
translated: One who has entered the stream,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am /

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'am /

original: dgra bcom pa'am /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'am /

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas sam /

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'am /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa yin te / don dam par ni 'thob pa'ang med /

analyzed: dgra bcom pa'ang med /

original: rang sangs rgyas kyang med /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyang med /
translated: no solitary realizer,

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'ang med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'ang med /

analyzed: @351b sangs rgyas kyang med do //
translated: and no buddha.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

analyzed: 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du gzugs med pa /

analyzed: bstan du med pa /

original: thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ste /

analyzed: rnam grangs des na skye ba'ang mi skye la skye ba med pa'ang mi skye'o //

translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: chos ma skyes so // chos ma skyes so //

translated: I do not have the eloquence to say that dharmas are not produced.

original: chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med par brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho bo la med do //
analyzed: chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med par brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho bo la med do //
translated: I do not have the eloquence to say that dharmas that are not produced are not produced.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma @352a *//🔽yin zhing gzugs can ma yin pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma @352a *// yin zhing gzugs can ma yin pa /
translated: it is because all those dharmas—those that are not produced, those that are not produced, that eloquence, that expression, and that nonproduction—are neither joined nor disjoined, are formless,

original: bstan du med pa /
analyzed: bstan du med pa /
translated: cannot be shown,

original: thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: and have no obstruction.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //🔽sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro // sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Because they are all of one single mark, which is no mark.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /🔽brjod pa'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / brjod pa'ang skye ba med /
translated: ” Śāriputra then said, “Venerable Subhūti,🔽is it that expression is not produced,

original: spobs pa'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: spobs pa'ang skye ba med /
translated: is it that eloquence is not produced,🔽and is it that the nonproduction of dharmas is not produced?

original: chos kyang skye ba med de /
analyzed: chos kyang skye ba med de /
translated: The Dharma is also unborn.

original: gang dag las brtsams te brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam /
analyzed: gang dag las brtsams te brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam /
translated: Are those phenomena that are to be expressed, beginning with what?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just so.

original: brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o //
translated: What is expressed is unborn.

original: spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o //
translated: Eloquence is unborn.

original: chos ni skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is unborn.
